description: This rich lamb curry is perfectly tender thanks to six hours in the slow cooker.
name: Lamb & Pumpkin Curry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400g pumpkin, peeled and cut into cubes

recipeInstructions.text: Heat half of the oil in a large pan on medium high heat and seal the lamb in batches, cooking 56 minutes until browned on all sides. Remove with a slotted spoon and place in the slow cooker.
Heat the remaining oil and cook the onion for 5 minutes, add the pumpkin, cumin and curry paste and cook for 23 minutes, stirring. Tip the mix into the slow cooker and mix well.
Pour in the chopped tomatoes and add the coriander stalks. Cook on low for 5.5 hours, stir in the coconut milk and cook for 30 minutes.
Serve with coriander leaves scattered on top, lime wedges and rice, if desired.
